One last post.

::KitKat::
She thought about the council that she had started with Aracnia.  She 
wondered if Megatron wold be willing to join as well.  She knew that 
he had enough hatred to fule 10 wars against the maximals.
She got up and walked back to the entrance.  She stood in the door 
way of the base and opened her link, putting on a direct link so 
other may not over hear. "Megatron. It's no secret that you don't 
like me or that you'd rather have my metal hide tacked up on the wall 
in your base.  But I have a proposal for you to think about before we 
meet. I am putting together a predacon council.  A predacon council 
here on earth.  I would like to ask you to concider the idea of being 
the commander of your own group, but host a seat on this council.  If 
all the predacons unite, we can crush the maximals with one fearce 
blow instead of all these little battle.  You would lead along side 
with me and other predacon leaders.  We would create a glorios HIGH 
PREDACON COUNCIL here on earth. Think about that untill I contact you 
later on to notify you where we shall meet. KitKat out."

She closed her link and walked back into the base.  She thought about 
what she had just done. Megatron would make a better ally, than an 
enemy. She just hoped she could sway him over to her side.
